ygData.subject: Re: Bear Hide Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Chandra Miller only makes bear hide armor.  You need to talk to Karg Icebear to get polar bear armor made.  Other than that just make sure you have the right
ygData.messageBody:
Chandra Miller only makes bear hide armor. You need to talk to Karg Icebear
to get polar bear armor made. Other than that just make sure you have the
right hide quality (low, medium, and high) for the piece that you want her
to make along with the correct amount of gold.


Trystesa, on Tunare

> From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
> I have tried to get bear hide belt and boots from Chandra Miller twice,
but
> she just takes my money and bear pelts, and says something like "Oh thank
> you, but I still need the other thing". Has anyone gotten the boots and
> belt from her (I already have a polar bear cloak so don't need the bear
> hide cloak)? Talking to her is not the problem, she tells me what she
needs
> to make the stuff. Thanks.
>
> Greg (Kronan)
